content.question: A test of the hypotheses H0 : µ = 0 versus Ha : µ > 0 was conducted using a sample of size 7. The test statistic was t = 1.935. Which of the following is closest to the p-value of the test?

topic.text: 7.5: Carrying Out a Test for a Population Mean

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Calculate a test statistic and find a p-value, provided conditions for inference are met.
